_comment: x86 architecture list of programs under test

hello._comment: These are test names, in case each program has more than one test

default._comment: The hello program has no arguments

stringpool._comment: These are test names, in case each program has more than one test

default._comment: The stringpool program has no arguments

lodsb._comment: The lodsb program checks if lodsb, stosb, and testb instructions work

default._comment: The lodsb program has no arguments

switch._comment: A test for switch statements, which hits mcsema's jump table handling
